name: diagrams-svg
description: SVG versions of Red Hat Diagrams

scripts.start: npm run browser-sync -- start -s for-web/ --files for-web/**/* --no-ui --no-notify --no-inject-changes
scripts.build: npm run build:diagrams && npm run build:listing
scripts.postinstall: cp -Rp node_modules/@cpelements for-web/_listing-page-assets/ && cp -Rp node_modules/@patternfly for-web/_listing-page-assets/

author: wesruv
